name: Soccer Random
description:
Twoplayergames fun pixelated physics-based soccer game where you control two soccer players in simple one-button gameplay. Challenge a friend to a match in local 2 player game mode.

Sometimes you will play on a iced field or you will play on a beach. The goal of the game is, to score 5 goals and win the game even the balls, players or goal posts change!

You can play Soccer Random game either against CPU or against a friend in 2 player gaming mode!

Game Features:
- Great physics in gameplay! ( It's popular 2 player game. )
- Easy control
- Fun pixel graphics
- Various match fields, balls and characters...

Tap button to jump and kick the ball.
Have Fun!
